data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Spectrum Electrical Industries Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from March 28 2025 the equity shares of Spectrum Electrical Industries Ltd  (Scrip Code: 544386) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250326-21 dated March 26 2025.
